commit.message:
trans-array.c (gfc_set_vector_loop_bounds): Get loop from ss.

	* trans-array.c (gfc_set_vector_loop_bounds): Get loop from ss.
	Remove loop argument.
	(gfc_add_loop_ss_code): Update call.

From-SVN: r180885

files.patch:
@@ -1,3 +1,9 @@

+
+	* trans-array.c (gfc_set_vector_loop_bounds): Get loop from ss.
+	Remove loop argument.
+	(gfc_add_loop_ss_code): Update call.
+
 2011-11-03  Mikael Morin  <mikael@gcc.gnu.org>
 
 	* trans.h (struct gfc_ss): New field loop.
